summary: SUB FRAME OF VAN HAS CRACKED CAUSING SEVERE VIBRATION.  ALL MOTOR MOUNTS FAILED.  MY 1990 HAD SIMILAR PROBLEM.  VAN IS BARLEY DRIVABLE AND UNSALEABLE.  THROW IN TWO COMPLETE AC SYSTEMS, TWO MULTI-FUNCTION SWITCHES(LOOKS LIKE #3 IS LININGS UP), A CLOCKSPRING(RECALL) AND TOP IT OFF WITH HORRIBLE SERVICE.  LOYALTY SHOULD BE A TWP WAY STREET!! TS
